org.taverna.server.localworker.remote

Interface RemoteSingleRun

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalWorker

    public interface RemoteSingleRun
extends Remote

    • Method Detail

      • getInputBaclavaFile

        @Nullable
String getInputBaclavaFile()
                              throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        The name of the Baclava file to use for all inputs, or null if no Baclava file is set.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • setInputBaclavaFile

        void setInputBaclavaFile(@Nonnull
                         String filename)
                  throws RemoteException
        Sets the Baclava file to use for all inputs. This overrides the use of individual inputs.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename to use. Must not start with a / or contain any .. segments. Will be interpreted relative to the run's working directory.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • getInputs

        @Nonnull
List<RemoteInput> getInputs()
                              throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        The list of input assignments.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • makeInput

        @Nonnull
RemoteInput makeInput(@Nonnull
                               String name)
                        throws RemoteException
        Create an input assignment.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the port that this will be an input for.
        Returns:
        The assignment reference.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • getOutputBaclavaFile

        @Nullable
String getOutputBaclavaFile()
                               throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        The file (relative to the working directory) to write the outputs of the run to as a Baclava document, or null if they are to be written to non-Baclava files in a directory called out.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • setOutputBaclavaFile

        void setOutputBaclavaFile(@Nullable
                          String filename)
                   throws RemoteException
        Sets where the output of the run is to be written to. This will cause the output to be generated as a Baclava document, rather than a collection of individual non-Baclava files in the subdirectory of the working directory called out.
        Parameters:
        filename - Where to write the Baclava file (or null to cause the output to be written to individual files); overwrites any previous setting of this value.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • getStatus

        @Nonnull
RemoteStatus getStatus()
                         throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        The current status of the run.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • setStatus

        void setStatus(@Nonnull
               RemoteStatus s)
        throws IllegalStateTransitionException,
               RemoteException,
               ImplementationException,
               StillWorkingOnItException
        Set the status of the run, which should cause it to move into the given state. This may cause some significant changes.
        Parameters:
        s - The state to try to change to.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateTransitionException - If the requested state change is impossible. (Note that it is always legal to set the status to the current status.)
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        ImplementationException - If something goes horribly wrong on the back end.
        StillWorkingOnItException - If the startup time of the workflow implementation exceeds a built-in threshold.

      • getFinishTimestamp

        @Nullable
Date getFinishTimestamp()
                           throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        When this workflow run was found to have finished, or null if it has never finished (either still running or never started).
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • getStartTimestamp

        @Nullable
Date getStartTimestamp()
                          throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        When this workflow run was started, or null if it has never been started.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • getWorkingDirectory

        @Nonnull
RemoteDirectory getWorkingDirectory()
                                      throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        Handle to the main working directory of the run.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • getListeners

        @Nonnull
List<RemoteListener> getListeners()
                                    throws RemoteException
        Returns:
        The list of listener instances attached to the run.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • addListener

        void addListener(@Nonnull
                 RemoteListener listener)
          throws RemoteException,
                 ImplementationException
        Add a listener to the run.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        ImplementationException - If something goes wrong when adding the listener.

      • getSecurityContext

        @Nonnull
RemoteSecurityContext getSecurityContext()
                                           throws RemoteException,
                                                  ImplementationException
        Returns:
        The security context structure for this run.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        ImplementationException - If something goes wrong when getting the context.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
      throws RemoteException,
             ImplementationException
        Kill off this run, removing all resources which it consumes.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
        ImplementationException - If something goes horribly wrong when destroying the run.

      • getListenerTypes

        @Nonnull
List<String> getListenerTypes()
                                throws RemoteException
        Get the types of listener supported by this run.
        Returns:
        A list of listener type names.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • makeListener

        @Nonnull
RemoteListener makeListener(@Nonnull
                                     String type,
                                     @Nonnull
                                     String configuration)
                              throws RemoteException
        Create a listener that can be attached to this run.
        Parameters:
        type - The type name of the listener to create; it must be one of the names returned by the getListenerTypes() operation.
        configuration - The configuration document for this listener. The nature of the contents of this are determined by the type.
        Returns:
        A handle for the listener.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • setInteractionServiceDetails

        void setInteractionServiceDetails(@Nonnull
                                  URL interactionFeed,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  URL webdavPath,
                                  @Nullable
                                  URL publishUrlBase)
                           throws RemoteException
        Configures the details to use when setting up the workflow run's connnection to the interaction feed.
        Parameters:
        interactionFeed - The location of the interaction feed. If null, defaults from the factory will be used instead.
        webdavPath - The location used for pushing web pages to support the feed. If null, a default from the factory will be used instead.
        publishUrlBase - Where to actually publish to, if this needs to be different from the location presented in the published HTML and Feed entries. Necessary in complex network scenarios.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • ping

        void ping()
   throws RemoteException
        A do-nothing method, used to check the general reachability of the workflow run.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.

      • setGenerateProvenance

        void setGenerateProvenance(boolean generateProvenance)
                    throws RemoteException
        Sets whether we should generate provenance information from a run.
        Parameters:
        generateProvenance - Boolean flag, true for do the generation. Must be set before starting the run for this to have an effect.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - If anything goes wrong with the communication.
